title: King Poro merchandise?
body: Hi, is the King Poro plush a limited edition item that is only available in Worlds 2016? Or will it be available later in the merchandise store?

replies.body: It is only available at 2016 World's Merch store. I see some are being sold on ebay, but other than that, nope, sorry!
Was hoping an offical Rioter would respond. Sorry. I already saw the ones on Ebay.

*Senpai Assassin* is correct, the Poro King plush was indeed an exclusive item for Worlds. :'(

I'm not aware of any other plans to sell it outside of the merch store at worlds. Let me know if you have any other questions.

I mean, I asked them at the Merchandise store, and that's what they were telling me lol.
Sorry if not being a Rioter makes it any less valid.
Hey, you may have seen it by now on the Riot Merch store, but the King Poro plush is now part of their Snowdown merch collection{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Yup, I saw! Thanks anyways! Merry Christmas! :D
